system.descriptionText:
-5 Ballistic Skill, -5 Toughness, +5 Agility, +5 Fellowship. Gain Common Lore (Koronus Expanse) and Psyniscience as Trained Skill (Psyniscience acts as sixth sense, not innately psychic). Gain Polyglot Talent one Peer Talent from the noted list. Suffer -5 on any Scholastic Lore Test not related to the Kornus Expanse and gain Rival (Inquisition) Talent.
Noted List: Choose one of: Peer(Astropaths, the Insane, Underworld, Void Born, or Workers)
